KITE 24.01
  • Reference

    Update expenditure for Chowdhry, Hinz, Kamin & Wanner (2022)

    update_expenditure_chkw_2022.Rd

    Updates expenditures following Chowdhry, Hinz, Kamin & Wanner (2022) equation (13).

    update_expenditure_chkw_2022(
  expenditure_new,
  consumption_share,
  input_share,
  trade_share_new,
  tariff_new,
  export_subsidy_new,
  value_added,
  wage_change,
  trade_balance,
  transfer,
  model_dimensions,
  tolerance,
  verbose
)

    Arguments

    expenditure_new

    Matrix of new expenditures, dimensions: sector x country.

    consumption_share

    Matrix of elasticities of substitution or consumption shares, dimensions: sector x country.

    input_share

    Array of beta-multiplied input-output coefficients, dimensions: input_sector x output_sector x country.

    trade_share_new

    Array of new trade flows (FOB), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.

    tariff_new

    Array of new tariffs, dimensions: origin x destination x sector.

    export_subsidy_new

    Array of export taxes, dimensions: origin x destination x sector.

    value_added

    Matrix of value added, dimension: country.

    wage_change

    Vector of change in wages, dimension: country.

    trade_balance

    Vector of aggregate trade balance, dimension: country.

    transfer

    Vector of transfers, dimension: country.

    model_dimensions

    List of model dimensions.

    tolerance

    tolerance

    verbose

    verbose

    Value

    Matrix of new expenditures, dimensions: sector x country.

    Contents

    Developed by Julian Hinz, Hendrik Mahlkow, Joschka Wanner.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
